resources.string: 1. Ensure that this device is set to \"Allow mock locations\" under Settings -> Applications -> Development.
2. Go to the Data tab of this application and select your X-Plane version. Leave the next two boxes checked for automatic configuration of X-Plane.
3. Set the Paused/Active button to Active. This starts a background service to keep data flowing while you switch to another application.
4. If there are any issues please consult the application manual available on the appropel.com website for further instructions.
This device must be set to \"Allow mock locations\" under Settings -> Applications -> Development.\n\nOnce this is done, return to X-Plane to GPS.
X-Plane to GPS is listening for data from X-Plane.
Enter the IP address of the machine running X-Plane:
Enter the IP address to forward packets to:
Enter the port to receive data from X-Plane:
